dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.offer.placement.ProductPlacement
dataStructure.description:
A description of how ProductOfferings are marketed, such as via direct mail. A ProductPlacement contains qualitative statements, or assessments that describe such things as market penetration, product strategy, and so forth.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ProductPlacement

child.name: media
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MediaTargetedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: media
